Title: Project - Squared
Description: Simple and easy Real Time Strategy game that focuses on gameplay and not on graphics. Game's written in C#, with help of XNA Game Framework (4.0), giving us ability to deploy to a wider range of platforms. Interesting fact: 2D shapes are rendered using vector graphics, in that way we get this very simple and cartoonish look.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Simple and easy Real Time Strategy game that focuses on gameplay and not on graphics. Game's written in C#, with help of XNA Game Framework (4.0), giving us ability to deploy to a wider range of platforms. Interesting fact: 2D shapes are rendered using vector graphics, in that way we get this very simple and cartoonish look.


Screenshots

These screenshots are taken on Windows 7 (x64) machine under 1024x768 resolution.
